title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The future for Gervonta Davis
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The future for Gervonta Davis
description:
Al Bernstein, the hall of Famer, and Showtime boxing broadcaster stops by to run through all the news of the week, from Demetrius Andrade's decision to move up in weight, the rumors swirling about Anthony Joshua taking step aside money, Gary Russell Jr's future, plus, are we going to see Gervonta Davis in the ring with a top fighter at lightweight in 2022. Later, Trevor Bryan, the WBAs regular heavyweight champion joins Chris to discuss how we can inject himself into the mix with the other top heavyweights.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
